CCRH Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 08 Senior and Junior Research Fellow Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 16, 2025, 15:32 IST
 Ministry of AYUSH
 8 Jobs |  Posted On : 16-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 37,000 to 42,000




FOLLOW

The Central Council for Research in Homoeopathy (CCRH) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 08 Senior Research Fellow and Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., BHMS can grab this chance and apply for the CCRH Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the given venue. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Delhi.

CCRH Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Senior Research Fellow	07	BHMS
Junior Research Fellow	01	M.Sc

Age Limit for the CCRH Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the CCRH Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the CCRH Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 37,000 /- per month
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 42,000 /- per month

Application fee for the CCRH Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the CCRH Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Senior Research Fellow notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, attend the interview at the address given below.

Venue

DDPR Central Research Institute for Homoeopathy, A-1/1, Sector-24, Noida-201301

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in-Interview	29-08-2025
Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
